name: The Angels Halo
description:
-The Angels Halo-

The soldiers of the underworld have invaded Heaven. One brave Angel charged into battle but during the process she lost her halo and was captured by demons. The demon boss currently holds her captive in a prison cell and you, her halo,  need to save her. The fate of the world rests in your hands...

This game was made by Qauk in 3 days for the MiniJam. This is my second time creating a game and I made all the assets/scripts. A few things are unfinished such as the story, menus and sprites. Please view this project as a WIP game.

Thanks for playing! 

-Qauk

Please leave honest feedback btw :D
